entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING ENDED, Lethbridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:49 p.m. MDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.9Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lethbridge Airport 6:00 PM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.9°C

Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 82 %

Wind: WNW 21 km/h

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then becoming light late this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Fog patches overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023
